After executing your plan, the final state will be:

This meets your goal of having the red block on top of the orange block and the blue block on top of the red block.

However, your goal also mentions that you want the blue block to be clear, the orange block to be clear, and the red block to be clear. Currently, the blue block is on top of the red block, so it's not clear. To achieve this, you would need to unstack the blue block from on top of the red block and put it back on the table.
